import { Component, OnInit, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about-us.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about-us.component.css'], }) export class AboutUsComponent implements OnInit { stats = [ { label: 'Projects', value: 70, icon: 'checklist' }, { label: 'Employees', value: 140, icon: 'group' }, { label: 'Customers', value: 340, icon: 'groups' }, ]; private statsAnimated = false; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} @HostListener('window:scroll', []) onWindowScroll() { const statisticsSection = document.querySelector('.statistics'); if (statisticsSection) { const sectionTop = statisticsSection.getBoundingClientRect().top; const windowHeight = window.innerHeight; if (sectionTop < windowHeight && !this.statsAnimated) { this.animateStats(); this.statsAnimated = true; } } } animateStats(): void { this.stats.forEach((stat, index) => { const element = document.getElementById(`stat-${index}`); if (element) { let count = 0; const target = stat.value; const increment = Math.ceil(target / 50); const interval = setInterval(() => { count += increment; if (count >= target) { count = target; clearInterval(interval); } element.innerText = count.toString(); }, 50); } }); } }

About Us

Home - About Us

Who We Are

Build Wise is a specialized contracting company founded in 2016 in Kuwait, now successfully operating in Bahrain and Saudi Arabia. We are experts in the design, supply, and execution of Post Tensioning concrete for buildings and in providing bearings and expansion joints for buildings and bridges. Our team combines technical expertise with a commitment to quality, delivering tailored solutions for a variety of construction needs. With a wide range of high-quality construction materials, we're equipped to meet the diverse demands of our clients across the region.

our mission

We aim to proactively address industry challenges to improve project outcomes for our clients. By selecting top engineers, skilled technicians, and well-trained workers, we continuously develop our team to stay current with modern construction technologies. This commitment helps us deliver the highest level of customer satisfaction.

our vision

With over 20 years of experience in the construction industry, we understand the common challenges that impact customer satisfaction and project success. Our vision is to set new standards in construction, focusing on quality, efficiency, and reliability to exceed customer expectations.

Our strength

We pride ourselves on choosing the best talent, from engineers and technicians to trained workers, and on our commitment to continuous team development. By staying updated with modern technologies, we ensure that our team is equipped to handle evolving industry demands, maintaining high standards across all our projects.
